name: Monument (itch) (Abel Neto)
description:
Instructions:

WASD - Movement

Mouse - Look around

Left Mouse Button - Interact

Concept:

This game was created for MAD Game Jam 2020, for the theme "Mythology". We decided we wanted to explore not a single myth but rather a theme that is present in a number of mythologies across cultures: The Absent Creator.

Thus, we explored different human perspectives related to the sense of abandonment by a creator.

Credits:

Game Design: Abel Neto

3D Art: Abel Neto, Dário Pinto, João P. Marques, Miguel Sousa

Programming: Abel Neto, Pedro Moura

Music and SFX: Valter Abreu
